channel.title: Bonus xp weekend announced
channel.description: Hey all, just telling that jagex have releaced the date for the next bonus xp weekend. you can read about it here: [url=http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=xgoENM6i46s/forums.ws?16,17,821,61539199]http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=xgoENM6i46s/forums.ws?16,17,821,61539199[/url]

item.title: Bonus xp weekend announced
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

yeah,in 4 hours i have gotten 60-63 rc, 77-79 att, 76-78 str 76-77 hp 400k xp on cooking and 63-65 slayer

Read full topic

item.title: Bonus xp weekend announced
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:7, topic:356087”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=452628.msg3316582#msg3316582 date=1282354945]
Drumgun abused a glitch the other day, managed to avoid ban somehow. The glitch caused some people when summoning to not loose their secondary supplies, and only half their shards.

There was however some guy on the last XP weekend who got 25m xp in 2 days.

Found who it was! Toony001, heres a screenshot of him not long before the first double weekend:
[/quote]

Drumgun got 200m exp over a period of a week or so, I find it highly doubtful that a bug that huge wasn’t patched for over a week.[/quote]
It is extremely easy to do, believe it or not. To put things into perspective, you can do more than 2k charms an hour using spirit kyatts. With blue charms being converted into Geyser titans, that’s 783.2xp per charm. With crimson charms being converted into steel titans, it’s 435.2xp per charm.
Basically 1m an hour is not only doable, but easy, when all of the required charms and ingredients are collected ahead of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Bonus xp weekend announced

For everyone interested, the weekend has now started. I managed 520k experience in the first hour – it was great.

There was however some guy on the last XP weekend who got 25m xp in 2 days.

Found who it was! Toony001, heres a screenshot of him not long before the first double weekend:[/quote]

item.title: Bonus xp weekend announced
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:3, topic:356087”]Sadface.

That damn sadfuck from the last XP weekend has resulted in summoning being limited to 10% of the bonus multiplier ):

uno, the one who got like 25m xp in 2 days?[/quote]

If you’re talking about Drumgun, he didn’t even do it on 2x exp days.

http://runetracker.org/records-24

The fact that you can gain 40m+ in a day without any multipliers might have tipped them off ;p

Read full topic

item.title: Bonus xp weekend announced
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Fucking lame. I got all excited about being able to get 88 summoning with half the charms.
They should have kept it consistent.

Herblore would be worth training, as would crafting and smithing. All three of those skills cost around the 20gp/xp mark on a normal day.

Read full topic
